vote.title: Authorize acquisition from Pepperwood, Inc., of approximately 46,804 square feet of land located near the intersection of Bachman Drive and Webb Chapel Extension for Bachman Lake Park Parking Lot Expansion Project - Not to exceed $745,000.00 ($735,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $10,000.00) - Financing: Capital Gifts Donations and Development Fund
